message_1: What is the SHA-256 hash value of the message "Math is amazing!"?
message_2:
To compute the SHA-256 hash value of the message "Math is amazing!", you can use a programming language or an online tool. I cannot compute it directly as I am an AI language model. However, I can guide you on how to do it.

Here's an example using Python:

```python
import hashlib

message = "Math is amazing!"
hash_object = hashlib.sha256(message.encode())
hash_hex = hash_object.hexdigest()

print(hash_hex)
```

Running this code will give you the SHA-256 hash value of the message "Math is amazing!".
